Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel: Influenza B Lineage Genotyping Kit (VER 1.1)
CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel: Influenza B Lineage Genotyping Kit (VER 2)
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems (ABI) 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel: Influenza B Lineage Genotyping Kit for lineage identification of Influenza B viruses using RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for genotyping human influenza B viruses (B/Victoria or B/Yamagata lineage) from viral RNA in upper respiratory tract specimens or viral culture to aid in epidemiological surveillance; results should be used with clinical and epidemiological information.
